Html: Hi, did you find a solution for this? I'm having the same problem. I type ${search-pattern} and it only works sometimes. Seemingly it works only if I copy and paste it in if I've typed it in somewhere else, so I'm not sure if word might be putting in some extra stuff that messes the search and replace up...

hello,
i solved it by delete and retype the ${search-pattern} and it worked.
it seems that the problem lay in a word's mistyping when you modify the words.
if you remove / delete the ${search-pattern} and rewrite it will work.

2014-12-17 20:27 GMT+01:00 danbrowndan <[email removed]>:
